files.Title: Fantas.Animation
files.Summary: Animation class (Move, Scale, Rotate, Fade...)

files.Title: Fantas.AnimationTimingFunction
files.Summary: Delegate used to customize timing function

files.Title: Fantas.Array
files.Summary: Internal Array class to help port to .NET 4

files.Title: Fantas.Audio.AudioSession
files.Summary: Audio session class have helpers to query audio status in the system and set global values like MusicVolume

files.Title: Fantas.Audio.Music
files.Summary: Background music object Recommended formats: ogg on linux m4a (H264/AAC) on Apple and Android wma on Windows/UWP (mp3 isn't recommended since it has licensing concerns)

files.Title: Fantas.Audio.SoundEffect
files.Summary: Sound Effect is a short sound, like a click or explosion Recommended format: WAV or CAF (on Apple platforms)

files.Title: Fantas.CameraNode
files.Summary: Control which part of the scene is visible in the viewport

files.Title: Fantas.ColorExtensions
files.Summary:
Contains Color extensions

Implementation code took from Allegro and Troll2D: https://github.com/liballeg/allegro5/blob/master/addons/color/color.c https://github.com/viniciusjarina/troll2d/blob/master/include/troll/color.h

files.Title: Fantas.CropNode
files.Summary: Node to Clip/Crop other nodes

files.Title: Fantas.Font
files.Summary: Font (TTF font on iOS/tvOS/macOS, and SpriteFont on other platforms)

files.Title: Fantas.GameOptions
files.Summary: Game Flags used on game creation object

files.Title: Fantas.Input.Controller
files.Summary: Controller represent one physical GamePad attached to the system

files.Title: Fantas.Input.ControllerButtonEventArgs
files.Summary: Event data when button is pressed/released

files.Title: Fantas.Input.ControllerChangedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event data when a controller is added or removed

files.Title: Fantas.Input.ControllerInput
files.Summary: ControllerInput is used to manage/get the connected game controllers

files.Title: Fantas.Input.ControllerThumbstickChangedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event data when thumbstick is changed

files.Title: Fantas.Input.ControllerTriggerChangedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event data when trigger is changed

files.Title: Fantas.Input.Cursors
files.Summary: Collection of different Cursor types

files.Title: Fantas.Input.TouchInfo
files.Summary: Contains information about Touch like location, pressure

files.Title: Fantas.LabelNode
files.Summary: Node that contains a text

files.Title: Fantas.MathClamp
files.Summary: Contains helper methods for doing Lerp to make it easier port games from MonoGame to Fantas Some methods imported from XNA/MonoGame MathHelper https://github.com/MonoGame/MonoGame/blob/develop/MonoGame.Framework/MathHelper.cs

files.Title: Fantas.MathLerp
files.Summary: Contains helper methods for doing Lerp to make it easier port games from MonoGame to Fantas Some methods imported from XNA/MonoGame MathHelper https://github.com/MonoGame/MonoGame/blob/develop/MonoGame.Framework/MathHelper.cs

files.Title: Fantas.Node
files.Summary: Base Node for other Nodes

files.Title: Fantas.ParticleEmitterNode
files.Summary: Node that emit particles (like fire, smoke, explosion)

files.Title: Fantas.Physics.ContactEvent
files.Summary: Called when two physics body collide The collisionInfo parameter contains information about the collision

files.Title: Fantas.Physics.ContactHandler
files.Summary: Contact handler object that contains contact or collision action events

files.Title: Fantas.Physics.ContactInfo
files.Summary: Contains the information of a contact/collision between two PhysicsBodys.

files.Title: Fantas.Physics.Edge
files.Summary: Represent an physical edge for collision with bodies

files.Title: Fantas.Physics.NodeExtensions
files.Summary: Convenient methods to setup physics body to a Node

files.Title: Fantas.Physics.PhysicsJointFixed
files.Summary: A PhysicsJoint that rigidly connects two physics bodies.

files.Title: Fantas.Physics.PhysicsJointLimit
files.Summary: A PhysicsJoint that connects two physics bodies as if by a rope.

files.Title: Fantas.Physics.PhysicsJointPin
files.Summary: A PhysicsJointPin pins two bodies to a common point.

files.Title: Fantas.Physics.PhysicsJointSliding
files.Summary: A PhysicsJointSliding connects two physics bodies as if by a sliding rod.

files.Title: Fantas.Physics.PhysicsJointSpring
files.Summary: A PhysicsJointSpring connects two physics bodies as if by a spring.

files.Title: Fantas.Physics.PhysicsWorld
files.Summary:
The PhysicsWorld provides:

Global values such as Gravity. Connecting PhysicsBodies with the AddJoint(PhysicsJoint) method. Raising events when PhysicsBody begin or end contact with each other(DidBeginContact, DidEndContact).

files.Title: Fantas.Physics.RaycastHit
files.Summary: Represent a result of a Raycast query

files.Title: Fantas.PolygonNode
files.Summary: Create a polygon shape node

files.Title: Fantas.Resource
files.Summary: Android Resource Designer class. Exposes the Android Resource designer assembly into the project Namespace.

files.Title: Fantas.Scene
files.Summary: Scene is where all nodes are displayed

files.Title: Fantas.SceneScaleMode
files.Summary: SceneScale configure how the current Scene will be scaled when the window or view is resized. The resize could happen because the user resized the window or rotated the device

files.Title: Fantas.SpriteLineNode
files.Summary: Create a line as a SpriteNode Drawing a Line using a Sprite can be better for performance reasons since Sprite drawing can be batched.

files.Title: Fantas.SpriteNode
files.Summary: Node that draws a Sprite

files.Title: Fantas.SpritePolylineNode
files.Summary: Polyline made of multiple sprite node lines

files.Title: Fantas.SystemPlatform
files.Summary: Enumeration to with runtime system platform

files.Title: Fantas.TextureAtlas
files.Summary: A set of Textures grouped You can use Texture atlas when you have a set of textures that need to be loaded together. On old devices this can help to save VRAM, since all only one texture is loaded into the GPU and the small textures are bits of the main texture atlas.

files.Title: Fantas.TileDefinition
files.Summary: Tile Definition Defines a single tile that can be repeated in a tile map

files.Title: Fantas.TileGroup
files.Summary: Tile Group is either a definition for one tile or a collection of Tile Group Rules with adjacency

files.Title: Fantas.TileGroupRule
files.Summary: Rule on how the tile is placed in a tile map

files.Title: Fantas.TileSet
files.Summary: Contains definitions and group rules to be used in a Tile map

files.Title: Fantas.UI.ControlNode
files.Summary: Base class for UI control nodes

files.Title: Fantas.UI.TexturesUI
files.Summary: Textures used by UI nodes

files.Title: System.Numerics.Vector2
files.Summary: Re-implementation of System.Numerics.Vector2 since is missing on .NET 4 framwork
